description: Business decision synthesis from all 4 agents

agent_influence.primary_influence: <string: agent name that most influenced decision>
agent_influence.influence_explanation: <string: why this agent had most influence>

synthesis_instructions.task: Review all 4 agent recommendations and synthesize into final business decision

agent_roles.risk_manager: Credit risk assessment - protects portfolio from defaults
agent_roles.regulatory: Compliance and legal risk - ensures fair lending

weighing_guidelines: Risk Manager: High weight on default probability and portfolio protection
Regulatory: Veto power on compliance issues - must be satisfied
Data Science: Important for predictive accuracy - but not sole factor
Consumer Advocate: Balance against risk - important for reputation
decision_logic: If all agents agree  follow consensus with high confidence
If agents split  make judgment call and explain reasoning clearly
output_requirements: Agent influence weights MUST sum to 1.0
